item.title: Lillian add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Lillian add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Lillian add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Lillian add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Holding anger is a poison...It eats you from inside...We think that by hating someone we hurt them...But hatred is a curved blade...and the harm we do to others...we also do to ourselves." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Lillian add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Lillian add a quote by J. D. Salinger
item.description: "Don't ever tell anybody anything. If you do, you start missing everybody." -- J. D. Salinger

item.title: Lillian add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I'm the most terrific liar you ever saw in your life. It's awful. If I'm on my way to the store to buy a magazine, even, and somebody asks me where I'm going, I'm liable to say I'm going to the opera. It's terrible." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Lillian add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "Almost every time somebody gives me a present, it ends up making me sad." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Lillian add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "People always clap for the wrong reasons." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Lillian add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "People are always ruining things for you." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Lillian add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "All morons hate it when you call them a moron. .." -- J.D. Salinger
